title: School of Medicine Class of 1987 Fund
description: To provide support for the School of Medicine which may include, but is not limited to, scholarships, capital, and student programs with a more specific purpose to be determined no later than the 50th class reunion in 2037.
marketingContent: To provide support for the School of Medicine which may include, but is not limited to, scholarships, capital, and student programs with a more specific purpose to be determined no later than the 50th class reunion in 2037.
